channel.title: STILL need help with compiler and Code
channel.description:
Okay So I've only just started working on the server and I do have a lot to do to it but before i deal with them i need to get the compiler to work because I like to check how it looks after i apply/change things. My problem is that when I try to load the compiler I get this issue: [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/scyqrq.png[/img] As you can see it has 1 Error which has something to do with the CombatAssist File. So after a little bit of mucking about, I managed to pinpoint the problem but not how to resolve it. [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/esvij6.png[/img] the screen shot i referred to in the above screenshot is below. [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/244bixc.png[/img] If you need any more info so that you can help me resolve this issue, Please let me know. Apart form that Thanks in advance to anyone who may be of help to me with this situation. The server i'm trying to run is a 317 server but i believe it has objects from a 508+ (Chaotic gear and whatnot) [b]UPDATE[/b] We got that error out of the way but now its got another error stating that there is 100 errors. here is a copy of the error message i get when i try to compile.
apons || (c.goodDistance(c.getX(), c.getY(), Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].getX(), S erver.npcHandler.npcs[i].getY(), 2) && usingHally())) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:150: package Server does not exist Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].underAttackBy = c.play erId; ^ CombatAssistant.java:151: package Server does not exist Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].lastDamageTaken = Syst em.currentTimeMillis(); ^ CombatAssistant.java:219: package Server does not exist int nX = Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].getX( ); ^ CombatAssistant.java:220: package Server does not exist int nY = Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].getY( ); ^ CombatAssistant.java:243: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Config location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant if(usingBow && Config.CRYSTAL_BOW_DEGRADES) { // crystal bow degrading ^ CombatAssistant.java:255: package Server does not exist Server.itemHandl er.createGroundItem(c, 4207, c.getX(), c.getY(), 1, c.getId()); ^ CombatAssistant.java:276: package Server does not exist if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:277: package Server does not exist if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].isDead) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:281: package Server does not exist Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].facePlayer(c.playerId); ^ CombatAssistant.java:283: package Server does not exist if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].underAttackBy > 0 && Serve r.npcHandler.getsPulled(i)) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:283: package Server does not exist if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].underAttackBy > 0 && Serve r.npcHandler.getsPulled(i)) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:284: package Server does not exist Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].killerId = c.playerId; ^ CombatAssistant.java:285: package Server does not exist } else if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].underAttackBy < 0 & & !Server.npcHandler.getsPulled(i)) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:285: package Server does not exist } else if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].underAttackBy < 0 & & !Server.npcHandler.getsPulled(i)) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:286: package Server does not exist Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].killerId = c.playerId; ^ CombatAssistant.java:297: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Misc location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant int damage = Misc.random(rangeMaxHit()); ^ CombatAssistant.java:300: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Misc location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant damage2 = Misc.random(rangeMaxHit()); ^ CombatAssistant.java:302: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Misc location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant if (Misc.random(5) == 1 && c.lastArrowUsed == 92 43) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:304: package Server does not exist Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].gfx0(758); ^ CombatAssistant.java:308: package Server does not exist if(Misc.random(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].defence ) > Misc.random(10+calculateRangeAttack()) && !ignoreDef) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:308: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Misc location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant if(Misc.random(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].defence ) > Misc.random(10+calculateRangeAttack()) && !ignoreDef) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:308: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Misc location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant if(Misc.random(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].defence ) > Misc.random(10+calculateRangeAttack()) && !ignoreDef) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:310: package Server does not exist } else if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2881 || Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2883 && !ignoreDef) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:310: package Server does not exist } else if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2881 || Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2883 && !ignoreDef) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:314: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Misc location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant if (Misc.random(4) == 1 && c.lastArrowUsed == 92 42 && damage > 0) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:315: package Server does not exist Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].gfx0(754); ^ CombatAssistant.java:316: package Server does not exist damage = Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].HP/5; ^ CombatAssistant.java:323: package Server does not exist if (Misc.random(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i ].defence) > Misc.random(10+calculateRangeAttack())) ^ CombatAssistant.java:323: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Misc location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant if (Misc.random(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i ].defence) > Misc.random(10+calculateRangeAttack())) ^ CombatAssistant.java:323: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Misc location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant if (Misc.random(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i ].defence) > Misc.random(10+calculateRangeAttack())) ^ CombatAssistant.java:327: package Server does not exist Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].gfx100(1100); ^ CombatAssistant.java:334: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Misc location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant if (damage > 0 && Misc.random(5) == 1 && c.lastA rrowUsed == 9244) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:336: package Server does not exist Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].gfx0(756); ^ CombatAssistant.java:339: package Server does not exist if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].HP - damage < 0) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:340: package Server does not exist damage = Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].HP; ^ CombatAssistant.java:342: package Server does not exist if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].HP - damage <= 0 & & damage2 > 0) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:346: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Config location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.RANG E_EXP_RATE/3), 4); ^ CombatAssistant.java:347: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Config location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.RANG E_EXP_RATE/3), 1); ^ CombatAssistant.java:348: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Config location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.RANG E_EXP_RATE/3), 3); ^ CombatAssistant.java:353: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Config location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.RANG E_EXP_RATE), 4); ^ CombatAssistant.java:354: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Config location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.RANG E_EXP_RATE/3), 3); ^ CombatAssistant.java:359: package Server does not exist if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType >= 3777 && Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType <= 3780) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:359: package Server does not exist if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType >= 3777 && Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType <= 3780) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:374: package Server does not exist Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].underAttack = true; ^ CombatAssistant.java:375: package Server does not exist Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].hitDiff = damage; ^ CombatAssistant.java:376: package Server does not exist Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].HP -= damage; ^ CombatAssistant.java:378: package Server does not exist Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].hitDiff2 = dam age2; ^ CombatAssistant.java:379: package Server does not exist Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].HP -= damage2; ^ CombatAssistant.java:387: package Server does not exist Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].hitUpdateRequired = tr ue; ^ CombatAssistant.java:389: package Server does not exist Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].hitUpdateRequi red2 = true; ^ CombatAssistant.java:390: package Server does not exist Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].updateRequired = true; ^ CombatAssistant.java:393: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Misc location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant int damage = Misc.random(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[c.oldSpe llId][6]); ^ CombatAssistant.java:395: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Config location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.godSpe llDelay < Config.GOD_SPELL_CHARGE) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:396: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Misc location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant damage += Misc.random(10); ^ CombatAssistant.java:396: inconvertible types found : required: int damage += Misc.random(10); ^ CombatAssistant.java:402: package Server does not exist if (Misc.random(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].defenc e) > 10+ Misc.random(mageAtk()) + bonusAttack) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:402: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Misc location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant if (Misc.random(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].defenc e) > 10+ Misc.random(mageAtk()) + bonusAttack) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:402: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Misc location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant if (Misc.random(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].defenc e) > 10+ Misc.random(mageAtk()) + bonusAttack) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:402: operator + cannot be applied to int,Misc.random if (Misc.random(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].defenc e) > 10+ Misc.random(mageAtk()) + bonusAttack) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:402: operator + cannot be applied to ,int if (Misc.random(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].defenc e) > 10+ Misc.random(mageAtk()) + bonusAttack) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:405: package Server does not exist } else if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2881 || Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2882) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:405: package Server does not exist } else if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2881 || Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2882) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:410: package Server does not exist if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].HP - damage < 0) { ^ CombatAssistant.java:411: package Server does not exist damage = Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].HP; item.title: STILL need help with compiler and Code
item.dc:creator: @AncientX AncientX
item.description:
@AncientX wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:2, topic:387504”] private Client c; public CombatAssistant(Client c) { [/quote]

I tried this but Unfortunately i had no success, I still get the 100 Error Message

Also @the IDE post, what shall i do once i’ve got the IDE, Shall i just open the CombatAssistant file and see if it can find or spot the errors, or does this simple make it easier for myself to find them?

Thanks,

ancientX

Read full topic

@AncientX wrote:

Okay So I’ve only just started working on the server and I do have a lot to do to it but before i deal with them i need to get the compiler to work because I like to check how it looks after i apply/change things.

My problem is that when I try to load the compiler I get this issue:

As you can see it has 1 Error which has something to do with the CombatAssist File.
So after a little bit of mucking about, I managed to pinpoint the problem but not how to resolve it.

the screen shot i referred to in the above screenshot is below.

If you need any more info so that you can help me resolve this issue, Please let me know.

Apart form that Thanks in advance to anyone who may be of help to me with this situation.

The server i’m trying to run is a 317 server but i believe it has objects from a 508+ (Chaotic gear and whatnot)
